name: project_letter
description: The **Letter** project is a project management application composed of a backend built with **Node.js**, **Express**, and **Prisma** for database management, and a frontend built with **React** and **Vite** for the user interface. The project will be a social network to connect readers and writers through common interests.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix Backend" "npm run dev --prefix Frontend" "npx prisma studio --schema=./Backend/prisma/schema.prisma"
